abstract: What would you do if you logged onto your e-mail and received an unfamiliar message: “User name and password do not match”?
snippet: What would you do if you logged onto your e-mail and received an unfamiliar message: “User name and password do not match”?
lead_paragraph: LOGGING on to Gmail or other e-mail service has become a routine of daily life, completed without a thought. What would you do, however, if you woke up tomorrow, plugged in your user name and password as you always do, but then received an unfamiliar message: “User name and password do not match”?

headline.main: Can’t Open Your E-Mailbox? Good Luck
headline.print_headline: Can’t Open Your E-Mailbox? Good Luck
